author: marcsaeg
msg: Fixes one last JSP source disclosure bug.  On some platforms a URL ending
in .jsp%00 would cause the JSP's source text to be served back to the
URLDecode() now works similar to Apache httpd and treats %00 and %2f
as forbidden characters in a URL.

author: larryi
msg: Update release plan.  Issues and priorities aren't final and will be updated

author: marcsaeg
msg: Back porting from Tomcat 3.3.  This fixes compile problems on some platforms.
